CustomField.formula: Case(Loyalty_Status__c , "Carte Classique" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY60","Carte Classique" ,30,80), "Carte Classique (Corporate)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY60","Carte Classique" ,30,80), "Carte Classique (Eurostar Staff)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY60","Carte Classique" ,30,80), "Carte Blanche" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY5z","Carte Blanche" ,30,80), "Carte Blanche (Eurostar Staff)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY5z","Carte Blanche" ,30,80), "Carte Blanche (Corporate)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY5z","Carte Blanche" ,30,80), "Carte Blanche (VIP)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY5z","Carte Blanche" ,30,80), "Carte Blanche (Elite)" ,Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000IY61","Carte Blanche Elite",30,80), "EPP Default Tier",Image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015b0000000Imtk","EPP" ,30,80), null)
